name: Rahi Tan
feedback: I am glad that I took this phone. No problem whatsoever. Using oppo Reno 5pro 5G since the last 8 months. It's brand new till date.

name: Alaska
feedback: Its better to not to reply into something if you dont realize what they are saying. I know you dont own any note series before

name: Idaho
feedback: Been using my 12 Pro Max for over 11 months now and I must say I still fall in love with it everyday as I just bought it yesterday, I have 6 games loaded on the phone, email apps, photography apps, tons of music (i like to switch between apple music and spotify) and some entertainment apps like netflix and apple tv.

name: Maine
feedback: For camera there's no comparison, iphone 11 all the way.probably even the battery it's slightly better on 11, everything else it's better on xs max. hard choice

name: Mason
feedback: I noticed it was different from the main one but I would have never guessed that. Pixel artists dedicated camera huh? :/ what are they thinking?

name: John
feedback: Im having stuck up issues where System UI becomes unresponsive. I had to reboot the device all over.
